Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

nvd3¶

generate JavaScript charts using http://nvd3.org/ outputs strings to inline in HTML : no fancy JSON or server dependent stuff

nvd3.generate(y, x=None, length=100)[source]¶

return a list of values y(x), where x and y can be iterable, functions or generators

class nvd3.TestCase(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

Create an instance of the class that will use the named test method when executed. Raises a ValueError if the instance does not have a method with the specified name.
